lines.text: Gettin' married? She can't do that to me!
You can't blame her none, Mike. After all, she was caught between a stiff breeze and plenty of wind.
Well, you gave her a stiff breeze, and he gave her plenty of wind.
Well, he sells us the Fournier One-Minute Wart Remover. And, boy, is it fo-nay!

[In a mocking tone]
Exactly Oliver Twist!
She's what I call a very attractive woman!
Yeah, she's a very regular fella too.

[Giving up trying to batter open the door as the hold fills up with water]
Hey, it's no use! How good are you at drowning?

[Climbing on top of a crate]
Come on. Let's pick ourselves a comfortable spot to do it.
